LanguageData.BARNG_ConditionToggleDesc: Check to ensure only tamed animals in the colony with bonded colonists can gain random capacity/stat buffs. If unchecked any tamed animal within the colony can gain capacity/stat buffs so long as said animal has a master.
LanguageData.BARNG_CapacityTogglesDesc: Leave unchecked to include in the pool of available capacities to be buffed if a buff should be applied.
LanguageData.BARNG_BondedChange: {0} has developed a special bond with their master.
LanguageData.BARNG_MasterChange: {0} has grown in power by their master's side.
